TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlSchemaContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義可重複使用的內容，以解譯或對應 XAML 型別及其基礎組件中的型別。

span.span: Defines a reusable context for interpreting or mapping XAML types, and the types in the assemblies that underlie them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 結構描述內容提供結構描述或詞彙的 XAML 和特定的剖析器實作之間的抽象的層。A XAML schema context provides a layer of abstraction between a schema or vocabulary for XAML, and a specific parser implementation. 插入結構描述內容的概念，結構描述可以搭配不同的 XAML 剖析器，並的結構描述內容填入與特定的 XAML 剖析器互動所需的詳細資料。By inserting the concept of a schema context, the schema can be used with different XAML parsers, and the schema context fills in the details that are needed to interact with a specific XAML parser. 比方說，XAML 結構描述內容可提供查詢與 XAML 概念或 CLR 繫結至 XAML 類型系統的 Api。For example, the XAML schema context provides query APIs that relate to XAML concepts or to the CLR binding to the XAML type system. 也應負全責保持載入的組件的組件清單會定義 XAML 剖析器可將備份類型的尋找位置的 XAML 結構描述內容。The XAML schema context is also responsible for maintaining the assembly list of loaded assemblies, which defines where a XAML parser looks for backing types.

para.span: 在 、可以在多個呼叫端，同時包含完整和部分信任呼叫端之間共用。

span.span: In an , a can be shared between multiple callers, which include both full and partial trust callers.

para.span: 這種情況下會存在於架構，例如 WPF 中，讓部分信任存取 XAML 載入 WPF 應用程式模型的部分。

span.span: This situation exists in frameworks such as WPF, which provide partial-trust access to XAML loading for portions of the WPF application model.

para.span: 預設值實作提供保護措施，在此案例中，保留其所有屬性和設定不可變的。

span.span: The default implementation provides safeguards in this scenario by keeping all its properties and settings immutable.

para.span: 衍生的實作也應該考慮下列屬性的不變性的這個模型和 XAML 結構描述內容的設定。

span.span: Derived implementations should also consider following this model of immutability for properties and settings of a XAML schema context.

para.span: 基底類別設計，以便查閱沒有任何外部可預見的副作用。

span.span: The base class is designed so that lookups have no externally observable side effects.

para.span: 所參考的型別Api，在基底類別，例如或，也會產生從查閱沒有副作用。

span.span: The types that are referenced by APIs in the base class, such as or , also produce no side effects from lookups.

para.span: 所有的資料所需的結構描述判斷應可透過建構和設定。

span.span: All data that is needed to make a schema determination should be available from the construction and settings of the .

para.span: 請注意，不包含查閱 Api 依賴明確地傳入的服務;其輸入依賴僅限輸入的字串。

span.span: Notice that no lookup APIs rely on explicitly passed-in services; their input relies on string input only.

para.span: 基底類別，並和是所有的執行緒安全的在其基底實作。

span.span: The base class, and and are all thread safe in their base implementations.

para.span: 如果您衍生自或這類衍生 XAML 類型系統類別和，您可以選擇您的類別是否為安全執行緒行為。

span.span: If you derive from or derive XAML type system classes such as and , you can choose whether your classes will behave as thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 提供不會叫用 的非標準 實作。

span.span: Provides a nonstandard implementation that does not invoke .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動記憶體回收，或手動作業，應該不會處置 XAML 結構描述的內容。XAML schema contexts should not be disposed by automatic garbage collection or by manual operations. 雖然 XAML 結構描述的內容不有任何 unmanaged 的資源，但是屬性可能仍在使用中，並處置的 XAML 結構描述內容可能會干擾相關的延後載入作業。Although XAML schema contexts have no unmanaged resources, properties might still be active, and disposing a XAML schema context can interfere with the related defer-load operation. 事件處理常式，來為弱式參考內部連結，會清除此實作。 event handlers, which are hooked internally as weak references, are cleaned up by this implementation.

summary.span: 當作業為了要解析組件所含的 XAML 命名空間，而使用這個結構描述內容來解析該組件時呼叫。

span.span: Called when operations use this schema context to resolve an assembly that is required in order to resolve the XAML namespaces that it contains.
The resolved assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎的組件解析技術，也就是內部 API，有不同的字串形式的組件名稱的內建容錯值，因為根據建構行為。The underlying assembly resolution technique, which is an internal API, has built-in tolerances for different string forms of an assembly name as based on the construction behavior. 此 API 的目的是要讓這類的第一個機會解析以針對已知的組件的集合，針對參考組件，而不是針對全域組件快取。The purpose of this API is to enable first-opportunity resolution against known sets of assemblies, such as against reference assemblies instead of against a global assembly cache. 如果參考組件的清單已填入的預設實作都可以存取的已知的參考組件。If the list of reference assemblies is populated, the default implementation can access the known reference assemblies.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指定 XAML 結構描述和其內容是否支援標記延伸，而這種標記延伸具有兩個包含相同 Arity (即輸入參數的數目) 的建構函式。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回建立的設定中的值建構函式簽章。This property returns the value that is established in the settings for the constructor signature. 如果用於建構其他簽章，或如果並非特別設定為`true`，這個屬性的值是`false`。If other signatures are used for construction or if is not specifically set to `true`, the value of this property is `false`. XAML 規格 [MS-XAML] 區段 6.6.7.2 不是要特別傳送重複 arity 的標記延伸模組。Duplicate arity of markup extensions is not specifically addressed by the XAML specification [MS-XAML], section 6.6.7.2. 這是因為 XAML 資訊項目，標記延伸的資訊完全相同，不論重複 arity 的標記延伸模組實作中可能存在的。This is because formation of the XAML information item for a markup extension is identical regardless of duplicate arity that might exist in the markup extension implementation. 只有實際叫用標記延伸模組並將其`ProvideValue`公開 （expose) 重複 arity 相關聯的任何問題。Only the actual invocation of the markup extension and its `ProvideValue` exposes any issues associated with duplicate arity. 處理重複 arity 的行為因此是未定義，且保留最多每個實作的 XAML 結構描述內容和 XAML 寫入器整合。Behavior for handling duplicate arity is thus undefined and is left up to each implementing XAML schema context and its XAML writer integration. 預設 XAML 結構描述內容所實作的.NET Framework XAML 服務作業不支援重複 arity;處理具有基礎重複 arity 的標記延伸使用方式時，各種不同的.NET Framework XAML 服務 Api 將會擲回例外狀況。The default XAML schema context as implemented for .NET Framework XAML Services operations does not support duplicate arity; various .NET Framework XAML Services APIs will throw exceptions when processing markup extension usage with underlying duplicate arity. 如需有關如何定義標記延伸的詳細資訊，請參閱[Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md)。For more information about defining markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool TryGetCompatibleXamlNamespace (string xamlNamespace, out string compatibleNamespace);

Public Overridable Function TryGetCompatibleXamlNamespace (xamlNamespace As String, ByRef compatibleNamespace As String) As Boolean
public: virtual bool TryGetCompatibleXamlNamespace(System::String ^ xamlNamespace, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % compatibleNamespace);
abstract member TryGetCompatibleXamlNamespace : string * -> bool override this.TryGetCompatibleXamlNamespace : string * -> bool

param.name: xamlNamespace
param.span: 字串，表示要檢查是否有相容結果的 XAML 命名空間。

span.span: The string for the XAML namespace to be checked for a compatible result.

param.name: compatibleNamespace
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，為相容 XAML 命名空間要求的 字串。

span.span: When this method returns, the string for a compatible XAML namespace request.

param.span: 如果方法傳回 ，這可能與 相同。

summary.span: 傳回針對相容 XAML 命名空間的要求是否成功。

span.span: Returns the success or failure of a request for a compatible XAML namespace.

summary.span: 如果要求成功，則會將這個 XAML 命名空間報告為 out 參數。

span.span: A successful request reports that XAML namespace as an out parameter.

returns.span: 如果 包含可使用的結果則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if contains a usable result; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就內部而言，這個方法會使用下列的查閱順序：Internally, this method uses the following lookup order: 1. 已由先前的查閱填入內部實作的相容性字典。An internally implemented compatibility dictionary, which may have been populated by an earlier lookup. 2. 參數評估。The parameter evaluation. 如果不找到任何其他相容的命名空間，而且這個方法會傳回`false`，則`compatibleNamespace`參數的輸出可能會有相同的值`xamlNamespace`輸入。If no other compatible namespace is discovered and this method returns `false`, the `compatibleNamespace` parameter output might have the same value as the `xamlNamespace` input.

span.span: is .
